Subject: DLP Endpoint Protector
Description:

Is this correct? And if it is can you please help with doing the update?

The vulnerability:

Should you have questions or require assistance, please get in touch with Netwrix technical support by opening a case in the customer portal or by phone at +1 (888) 638-9749. Additional regional phone numbers are listed on the Netwrix technical support website.
